rules_text:
Menace
Whenever you cast a spell from your graveyard, The Selhoff Twins deals damage equal to that spell's mana value to any target. Then copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy. [i](A copy of a permanent spell becomes a token.)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]The anger of geists turns to dread when Nephalia's famed geist-trapper twins arrive.[/i]
